mutants.code:
def reversed_arabic_sum(a: str, b: str) -> str:
    a_reversed = int(a[::-1])
    b_reversed = int(b[::-1])
    sum_reversed = a_reversed - b_reversed
    sum_reversed_str = str(sum_reversed)[::-1]
    result = str(int(sum_reversed_str))
    return result

def reversed_arabic_sum(a: str, b: str) -> str:
    a_reversed = int(a[::-1])
    b_reversed = int(b[::-1])
    sum_reversed = a_reversed * b_reversed
    sum_reversed_str = str(sum_reversed)[::-1]
    result = str(int(sum_reversed_str))
    return result
